review: I am satisfied with the consultation with doctor except for one thing that I want to bring to the notice is the consultation fee shown in practo and in reality is varying to the extent of almost double. Even after prior booking, staff at Apollo hospital is charging emergency charge and other hidden charges. The  same was enquired with the staff to which he told that there is no affiliation of practo with the hospital even after showing the message that I received from Practo and Apollo hospital both about the confirmation of appointment. This is misleading to people and should have clarity on the same.

Very good doctor, she listens to all the problems patiently and treats patients cautiously not to hurt their pains and anxiety. She is very experienced doctor and please dont think there would be generation gap for the 20-30 age group patients. *** *** ********* *** ********* *** you dont even feel that you are interacting with doctor who is above 40-45+ yrs

I recommended all the patient to visit this doctor for general problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very bad service from the doctor** *** ****** ******** ***** ******** ** ***** ******** i had a fever rash on my body she was like consult skin doctor n eye doctor for redness****** **** *** ** *** ***** * ******* *********  ***** **** ******** **** ***** ****** ** ** **** ** unprofessional doctor never ever think of visiting this doctor  please save your time n money

Hi all my father admitted for pain in bladder on 8th of June.. Sharad sheker treated him for what reason i don't know.one of the medicine given by her has spelling mistake i request her to tell me what it must be her response was very rude n she didn't agree that she wrote it.. the billing is also very high for her checking up .. *** ******** **** ***** *** **** ** ****** ***i request all my friends not to go to her for check up * *** ** **** ** ****** * **** ** ***** * ********* ******* ** ** ******* **** *** *** **** ** **  ****** ******* ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
This Doctor is reluctant to see CGHS Patients. She asks the Patient not to come to her next time and follow up with CGHS. Look Apollo Hospital is CGHS empanelled and we are referred by CGHS for Specialists since CGHS do not have any Specialist for Cardio, Diabetes treatment etc., We can't understand why this Doctor is so reluctant to see CGHS Patients. 
Patient UHID: AHS.0000116561.Patient Name : Neela Hari. Came for review checkup on 21st December 2019 after getting discharged in same Hospital on 20th November 2019.

Absolutely wonderful person. Always cheerful, even with so many patients around. She hears you out with patience and then explains the problem very clearly and her suggested solution. We have been consulting with Dr. Sharda Shekar for over 5 years and are extremely happy

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Loved the experience, she was really friendly and gentle. She gave me time and actually understood the issues. She gave me her phone number to reach out once the test reports come so that I don't have to travel all the way again in sickness.
Very friendly and helpful advice. Overall, I was happy with the guidance she gave on what next to be done to improve my health .

tags: Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Highly recommended. Understood the problem and gave a details of it with medicines which is really helpful.

A very patient listener and also very accommodating. Excellent in diagnosing the actual problem which has led to the illness. Beyond everything, the personalised approach she maintains with her patients is what makes her unique.
She is very patient. She listens to what the patient describes patiently. She is very friendly. She makes the visitors comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ********* ******  friendly spoken, nice advise. liked  Referable to others without any issue. Value for money. Best suggestion provided about dieting and food system.  Suggested excellently about food timings and food method.  Enquired about family back ground and suggested very nicely on life style which I liked.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My experience was extremely random. The doctor kept moving into tangential issues such as pregnancy etc. Her only recommendation was to visit an ENT. While I understand that it could be her recommendation, she did not even explain the unrelated symptoms I explained such as shivers. I left more anxious than before and went to another doctor the next day who diagnosed me.
Very good. We had gone for a confirmatory opinion. The doctor explained the situation and risks and options clearly, My father came out confident to go ahead.

Dr Sharada Shekar is our family doctor for over a decade.  More than a doctor, she is a wonderful person who makes the patients feel comfortable and provides advise apart from medication.  Without any hesitation, we will strongly recommend her

She is a wonderful doctor we have been consulting for the last 14 years.  Though we stay in RT Nagar we go all the way to Malleswaram to consult her. Very good medical advisor  for the entire family of ours.
I know the her from 20 years she is the best docter I have seen she  is very friendly & attend the patient with patience

I felt good talking with doctor and had positive interaction.
Nice and nice talking with the doctor...
The doctor's words were very soothing and already started to see results. Assesses the issue very nicely.
The wait time was 2 hours. Whoch was clearly avoidable. And even in the consult it was just to refer to other specialists.

review: Doctor was very friendly, excellent doctor.she gives good information,and our confidence level will increase

review: She understands the patients problem and suggests appropriate measures. Good doctor and hard to find them these days.
A very patient person. She listens to you and then shares her inputs. The way she interacts with her patients makes them feel comfortable.
